Overview  Package   Extension 

org::fornax::utilities::xtendtools::lib
Extension assert

This extension provides functions for assertions.
Author:
Ingo Feltes
Function Summmary
Voidassert(Boolean assertion, String message)
    Asserts that the condition is true.
ObjectassertNotNull(Object object, String message)
    Asserts that the given object is not null.

Function Detail

assert

Void assert(Boolean assertion, String message)
Asserts that the condition is true. Throws an exception if the assertion failed.
Parameters:
assertion -
message -

assertNotNull

Object assertNotNull(Object object, String message)
Asserts that the given object is not null. Throws an exception if the assertion failed. Returns the object, otherwise.
Parameters:
object -
message -
